content:
With great joy I can announce the release of fhir-net-api version 1.5.0-beta1. This release contains the technical corrections for FHIR 3.0.2 and 4.0.1, together with some general bugfixes/improvements.

For a complete list, please visit the pages with the release notes:

  • STU3: https://github.com/FirelyTeam/fhir-net-api/releases/tag/v1.5.0-beta1-stu3
  • R4: https://github.com/FirelyTeam/fhir-net-api/releases/tag/v1.5.0-beta1-r4

There is also a 1.5.0-beta1 for DSTU2 but that is there to retain binary compatibility with the newer shared assemblies but has none of the new features.

Please note that this is beta release and not recommended for production use. The final release of 1.5.0 is planned for the end of January 2020.
